packages.name: phpcompatibility/php-compatibility

suggest.dealerdirect/phpcodesniffer-composer-ins: ^0.5 || This Composer plugin will sort out the PHPCS 'installed_paths' automatically.
suggest.roave/security-advisories: dev-master || Helps prevent installing dependencies with known security issues.

packages.description: A set of sniffs for PHP_CodeSniffer that checks for PHP cross-version compatibility.

packages.name: phpcompatibility/phpcompatibility-paragonie

suggest.dealerdirect/phpcodesniffer-composer-ins: ^0.7 || This Composer plugin will sort out the PHP_CodeSniffer 'installed_paths' automatically.
suggest.roave/security-advisories: dev-master || Helps prevent installing dependencies with known security issues.

packages.description: A set of rulesets for PHP_CodeSniffer to check for PHP cross-version compatibility issues in projects, while accounting for polyfills provided by the Paragonie polyfill libraries.

packages.name: phpcompatibility/phpcompatibility-wp

suggest.dealerdirect/phpcodesniffer-composer-ins: ^0.7 || This Composer plugin will sort out the PHP_CodeSniffer 'installed_paths' automatically.
suggest.roave/security-advisories: dev-master || Helps prevent installing dependencies with known security issues.

packages.description: A ruleset for PHP_CodeSniffer to check for PHP cross-version compatibility issues in projects, while accounting for polyfills provided by WordPress.

packages.name: squizlabs/php_codesniffer
packages.description: PHP_CodeSniffer tokenizes PHP, JavaScript and CSS files and detects violations of a defined set of coding standards.

packages.name: wp-coding-standards/wpcs

suggest.dealerdirect/phpcodesniffer-composer-ins: ^0.6 || This Composer plugin will sort out the PHPCS 'installed_paths' automatically.

packages.description: PHP_CodeSniffer rules (sniffs) to enforce WordPress coding conventions

packages.name: wptrt/wpthemereview

suggest.dealerdirect/phpcodesniffer-composer-ins: ^0.7 || This Composer plugin will sort out the PHPCS 'installed_paths' automatically.

packages.description: PHP_CodeSniffer rules (sniffs) to verify theme compliance with the rules for theme hosting on wordpress.org
